name: Smokin' Bones BBQ
notes: Smokin' Bones BBQ serves a signature blend of barbecue styles inspired by the great barbecue cities of Chicago, Memphis, Texas, and Kansas City. Their sauces are crafted to honor each of these regions, giving guests a rich variety of flavors in every bite. The team also puts special care into allergen awareness, making sure guests with dietary needs feel considered, informed, and safe when they order.
